effects.name: Major Resolve
effects.description: Increases Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.

effects.name: Major Breach
effects.description: Reduces Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.

effects.name: Minor Breach
effects.description: Reduces Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974.

effects.name: Minor Direct Damage Mitigation
effects.description: Reduces damage taken from direct damage attacks by approximately 6%.

effects.name: Minor Celerity
effects.description: Increases movement speed by 10%.

effects.name: Out of Combat Movement Speed
effects.description: Increases out-of-combat movement speed by 20%.

effects.name: Mounted Speed Bonus
effects.description: Increases movement speed while mounted by approximately 50%.

effects.name: Adept Rider Speed
effects.description: Movement speed bonus from Adept Rider, approximated as +20% movement speed. Stacks with Minor Celerity and Wild Hunt speed according to stacking rules.

effects.name: Ring of the Wild Hunt Speed
effects.description: Increases movement speed based on combat state, approximated as +15% movement speed for pillar calculations.

effects.name: Pariah Missing Health Mitigation (Approximate)
effects.description: Approximate Mark of the Pariah bonus: treated as +7000 Physical and Spell Resistance at low health for pillar calculations. Replace with exact scaling when real ESO data is imported.

effects.name: Green Dragon Blood HoT
effects.description: Self heal over time and recovery bonuses approximated as a generic HoT for pillar tracking.

effects.name: Barrier HoT
effects.description: Heals group members over time while Reviving Barrier persists, approximated as a generic HoT.

effects.name: Resolving Vigor HoT
effects.description: Applies a strong heal over time to you and nearby allies, approximated as a generic HoT.

effects.name: Reviving Barrier Shield
effects.description: Applies a large group damage shield, modeled as a generic shield effect for pillar tracking.

effects.name: Hardened Armor Shield
effects.description: Applies a small personal shield scaling with max health, approximated as a generic shield.

effects.name: Soul Burst Shield
effects.description: Applies a short-duration personal shield, approximated at half strength for pillar tracking.

effects.name: Ironclad Damage Taken Reduction
effects.description: Represents the Ironclad CP star's damage taken reduction for direct damage.

effects.name: Bull Netch Resource Buff
effects.description: Provides ongoing resource return and cleanse, approximated as a generic resource gain effect.

effects.name: Ulfsild's Defensive Proc
effects.description: Represents a conditional defensive proc from Ulfsild's Contingency, approximated as 10% damage taken reduction.

effects.name: Wield Soul Minor Buff
effects.description: Placeholder minor defensive buff applied after using Wield Soul, approximated as +1320 resist.

effects.name: Major Gallop
effects.description: Increases mount speed for Major Gallop effects.
